original_text: The Israelites who lived in Jabesh Gilead heard about what the Philistines had done to Saul's body.
korean_text: 길르앗 야베스 주민들이 블레셋 사람들이 사울에게 행한 일을 듣고

sentences.original_text: The Israelites who lived in Jabesh Gilead
heard about what the Philistines had done
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들이 한 일에 대해 들었으니
